name: Fur Fight
description:
A small game created with Gdevelop, where the objective is to simply shoot everything you see.

Added touch controls, so it can now be played on mobile devices.

In this game I used one of my character asset packs to display them. You can get this asset pack to use in your own game here:
https://ismartal.itch.io/2d-animated-pixel-fighters

The music for the game was composed by Alecxs Sunders https://alecxs-sunders.itch.io/

This was the first game created by me, so I would appreciate any constructive comments / criticisms you can offer, thank you and enjoy it.
